Description: The AACR is excited to announce the 19th Annual AACR Undergraduate Student Caucus and Poster Competition (USCPC) during the AACR Annual Meeting 2024 in San Diego, California. This exciting informative, and engaging session will take place in person, on April 6, 2024, and will bring together undergraduate students at all levels to address educational pathways, explore career options in the cancer field while presenting their own research and competing for prizes. All prizes are funded by the Margaret Foti Foundation which rewards excellence in research conducted and presented by undergraduate students.

Title: 19th Annual Undergraduate Student Caucus and Poster Competition
